attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of MOT has risen year upon year and it currently stands at £50.35 for cars. This cost is very high for  Pensioners( state pension) and people on early retirement(small private pensions). The cost of an MOT should be reduced together with the Road Tax as this is grossly unfair to Pensioners.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
